channel.title: Machine Learning on Kevin's Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Kevin's Codex

item.title: Chap1. Introduction & Motivation
item.description: We believe that the mathematical foundations of machine learning are important in order to understand fundamental principles upon which more complicated machine learning systems are built. 1.1 Finding Words for Intuitions machine learning algorithm (predictor) : a system that makes predictions based on input data training : a system that adapts some internal parameters of the predictor so that it performs well on future unseen input data
